name: Rainier vista
restroom: n: On most of Rainier Vista, buildings are not so close.
comfortable seating: n: A couple places with concrete benches
smooth surfaces: n: Path is paved on lower portion, but gravel on upper part
low vehicle traffic: y: Some distant noise from the road

name: Montlake Triangle
benches: y: The metal benches have dividers so you can't lie down, but there are a couple wide concrete ones.
smooth surfaces: n: Brick floor; most parts are in good level condition but some pots have jagged edges
views of nature: y: Mt. Rainier on clear days

name: ASUW Shellhouse
restroom: y: Shell house builing is only sometimes open for events. There are wide porta-potties outside the shellhouse
accessable: n: Shell house builing is only sometimes open for events. There are wide porta-potties outside the shellhouse
wheelchair access: y: Paved paths throughout, but with rough conditions in some spots
smooth surfaces: y: Paved paths throughout, but with rough conditions in some spots
level - no hills: n: Steep hill to get down to water

name: Union Bay Natural Area
wheelchair access: n: Dirt paths, many in rough condition
smooth surfaces: n: Dirth paths, many in rough condition

name: Portage Bay Vista
restroom: y: Lots of nearby buildings accessable from paths
single stall: y: Adjacent Oceanography building has a single-stall bathroom on 1st floor.
private/enclosed spaces: y: Enclosed wooden ring with a bench inside

name: Sakuma Viewpoint
restroom: n: Agua verde has restrooms for customers
benches: n: Benches too short to lie down
wheelchair access: y: Accessable paths currently under construction

name: South Campus Center
comfortable seating: y: Wood and soft plastic benches with backs
wheelchair access: y: Wheelchair-accessable path to the water from the patio is inconvenient. You have to go out through the front of the building and then around to the back.
level - no hills: n: Big steep hill to get to the water.
no stairs required: y: Long steep stairway to reach the water. The accessable path is pretty inconvenient and out-of-the-way.
open space: y: Open space on a hill
private/enclosed spaces: y: There are a few nice areas with benches tucked into trees, but they are difficult to access with a walker or wheelchair.

name: Lawn behind hospital
restroom: n: Hospital facilities are not so easy to get to from the back lawn
comfortable seating: y: Wood benches, with and without backrests
wheelchair access: n: Dirt and gravel paths, in rough condition
smooth surfaces: n: Dirt and gravel paths, in rough condition

name: Drumheller Fountain
lawn: y: Lawn often has goose poop
views of nature: y: Mt. Rainier on clear days
